svg.text: Design System Specification — 09 Sequencing Patterns & Validation Constraints
For frameworks, mental models, or structured insights. The most common format.
A provocative claim or sharp observation. Shorter, punchier.
Analyzing a real-world decision through the Tight Margins lens.
User builds their own sequence. Starts with Cover + Single Concept + Closing CTA (3 slides).
All fields enforced via maxLength on input + VALIDATION map. No field may exceed its limit.

g.text: Minimum 6, Maximum 12. addSlide() blocked at 12, removeSlide() blocked at 6.
Cover (index 0) cannot be moved, removed, or replaced.
Closing CTA (last index) cannot be moved, removed, or replaced.
moveSlide() rejects fromIndex=0, fromIndex=last, toIndex=0, toIndex=last.
Only these may be added: single-concept, comparison, framework, punchline, data.
Cover and closing-cta cannot be added manually (only via pattern selection).
New slides insert before the closing CTA (at slides.length - 1).
